title: Replace BullBoost Performance banner image with newly uploaded logo

requirements.summary: Replace the existing BullBoost Performance banner image with the newly uploaded logo (white text on black background) while maintaining the clickable affiliate link and horizontal sponsor layout
acceptanceCriteria: The new BullBoost Performance logo (white text on black background, 1600x900 source) is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png
The BullBoost banner in Layout.tsx renders the new image instead of the old one
Clicking the BullBoost banner opens https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new tab
The banner row still displays all three sponsor banners (eBay, BullBoost, Enjuku Racing) side-by-side
The banner is styled consistently with the app's dark automotive theme

file_operations.description: Save the newly uploaded BullBoost Performance logo image (cropped and resized from the 1600x900 source image with white 'Bull Boost' script and 'PERFORMANCE' text on black background) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png, replacing any existing file at that path. This generated image will be referenced in Layout.tsx.

Update the BullBoost banner anchor tag in the sponsor banner row to reference the new image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png. Ensure the anchor maintains target='_blank', rel='noopener noreferrer', and the affiliate link https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu. Verify the image src path is correct (/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png) and that the banner remains horizontally aligned with the existing eBay and Enjuku Racing sponsor banners. Do not modify the eBay or Enjuku Racing banner implementations.
